title: Missing persons cases 2012 to 2019
summary: The statistic shows the Number of cases in Missing from 2012 to H1_2019 .
According to the report , there were 1.58 million cases who had personal wealth of over 10 billion yuan in Missing 2018 , decreased from 1.61 million in the previous Year .
gold: In June 2019 , the number of cases of missing people amounted to 236,656.
More specifically , the chart displays the total number of reports recorded by the Police between 1974 and June 2019.
In 1974 , a database recording the number of missing people cases was started .
